record.name: Standard Laptop Bundle
record.description: Designed for employees on the go, this bundle includes a fully provisioned HP Laptop and productivity software. Optional accessories are available at an extra charge.
record.detailedDescription: Designed for employees on the go, this bundle includes a fully provisioned HP Laptop and productivity software. Optional accessories are available at an extra charge.
record.options: <form><label id="opt1">(1) Performance Laptop</label><label id="opt2">(1) Docking Station</label><label id="opt3">(1) Flat Screen Monitor</label></form>
